movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: BEST FILM OF ALL TIME!
review: Best film of all time!  Has a great plot, the best lightsaber fight ever, amazing FX, and great acting!  The story, while good, may be a little complex for a first-time viewer; see it as many times as needed, and then some!

title: A KICK ASS MOVIE
review: An excellent film for its time.  The camera work is amazing, the makeup FX are top, and the stop-motion is some of the coolest stuff you're ever going to see.  Watch this film!
